reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MUSC 201, MUSC 210.
3 credit (1 term) section of 409C which takes place in 15W Term 1.
courseName: Jazz Theory and Arranging - JAZ THRY & ARRAN
description: Jazz scales, chord relationships, substitutions, orchestration, listening, and score analysis. Restricted to B.Mus. and B.A. in Music students.
